TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewSortEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件的排序按鈕時 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 排序 」) 按下，但尚未控制項處理排序作業。The control raises the event when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消這個事件發生時的排序作業中，事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 雖然任何按鈕內用來控制其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 排序 」 將會引發事件，排序按鈕通常會出現在標頭資料列控制項。Although any button within a control with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort" will raise the event, Sort buttons typically appear in the header row of a control. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您指定或決定排序的排序運算式和排序方向控制項。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to specify or determine the sort expression and sort direction in which to sort the control. 若要判斷的排序運算式，請使用屬性。To determine the sort expression, use the property. 若要判斷的排序方向，請使用屬性。To determine the sort direction, use the property. 您也可以藉由設定取消排序作業屬性設`true`。You can also cancel a sorting operation by setting the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以取消排序作業，當使用者嘗試排序中的 [位址] 欄控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the sorting operation when the user attempts to sort the address column in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/CS/gridviewsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/VB/gridviewsortingvb.aspx#1)]

param.span: ，表示排序控制項中之項目的排序方向。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`sortDirection` 參數的值。The value of the `sortDirection` parameter.| ||`sortExpression` 參數的值。The value of the `sortExpression` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，這個建構函式會使用主要由控制項開發人員。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection SortDirection { System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定排序 控制項的排序方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to sort the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當就會引發事件，您可以使用屬性來決定的順序控制項就會排序其項目 （根據排序運算式中） 執行排序作業時。When the event is raised, you can use the property to determine the order in which the control will sort its items (based on the sort expression) when the sort operation is performed. 因為就會發生事件排序作業之前，您也可以使用屬性以程式設計方式設定的排序方向。Because the event occurs before the sort operation, you can also use the property to programmatically set the sort direction. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷要排序的方向控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the direction in which to sort a control. 如果使用者嘗試以遞減順序排序，則取消排序作業。If the user attempts to sort in descending order, the sort operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSortEventArgsSortDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSortEventArgsSortDirection/CS/gridviewsorteventargssortdirectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSortEventArgsSortDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSortEventArgsSortDirection/VB/gridviewsorteventargssortdirectionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式，用來排序 控制項中的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression used to sort the items in the control.

value.span: 用來排序 控制項中之項目的運算式。

span.span: The expression used to sort the items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當就會引發事件，您可以使用屬性來判斷將用來排序的排序運算式控制執行排序作業時。When the event is raised, you can use the property to determine the sort expression that will be used to sort the control when sort operation is performed. 根據預設，控制項一次排序單一資料行。By default, the control sorts a single column at a time. 排序運算式只會包含要排序之欄位的名稱。The sort expression simply contains the name of the field to sort. 您也可以一次排序多個資料行，以程式設計方式將此屬性設定為欄位名稱的逗號分隔清單。You can also sort multiple columns at a time by programmatically setting this property to a comma-separated list of field names. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷哪一個資料行中的排序控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which column in a control is being sorted. 如果使用者嘗試將地址的資料行排序，則取消排序作業。If the user attempts to sort the address column, the sort operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/CS/gridviewsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSorting/VB/gridviewsortingvb.aspx#1)]
